text: If you turn around, you will see a crafting table.
You can use a crafting table to produce weapons
by using items in your inventory. Right click the
table to interact with it.
You will now learn how to make an axe to defend yourself, using the
crafting table.
When you right-click the crafting table, you will see the crafting interface
with a 9x9 grid in the top left, a slot to the right of the 9x9 grid
a larger grid of items, and a row of slots at the bottom, which is the 'hotbar'
and is for items you want to access quickly.
You will see that you have 3 wooden blocks, and 2 sticks in your hotbar.
You will need to arrange them in the pattern shown below to craft the axe.
Left-click an inventory slot to grab the blocks in it, then place the grabbed
blocks in the 9x9 grid slots by right-clicking the slots.
Once you finish placing the items, in the correct pattern, the axe will show up
on the screen. Left-click on it to select it, and left-click on the
left-most slot in your hotbar to place it there.
Click OK when you are ready.
